panel.label: MEMBERS
panel.name: members_sub_tab
panel.panel.string: You can add or remove Roles assigned to Members. Select multiple Members by holding the Ctrl key and clicking on their names.

panel.label: ROLES
panel.name: roles_sub_tab
panel.panel.string: Roles have a title and an allowed list of Abilities that Members can perform. Members can belong to one or more Roles. A group can have up to 10 Roles, including the Everyone and Owner Roles.
The 'Everyone' and 'Owners' Roles are special and can't be deleted.

panel.label: ABILITIES
panel.name: actions_sub_tab
panel.tool_tip: You can view an Ability's Description and which Roles and Members can execute the Ability.
panel.panel.string: Abilities allow Members in Roles to do specific things in this group. There's a broad variety of Abilities.

scroll_list.name: action_list
scroll_list.tool_tip: Select an Ability to view more details
